revised_title: Rate of Emission of α-Particles from Uranium and its Products: A Study of Pitchblende
tldr: The authors investigate the rate of emission of α-particles from uranium and its products using pitchblende. They employ a zinc sulphide screen and a microscope to count scintillations produced by the α-particles. The results show that the rate of emission of α-particles from uranium is in fair agreement with previous findings.
